ValidationRule.description: Created to ensure UDC Workbook Administrators select Form or set URL but not both.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "AH_UDC_WorkbookStep", NOT ISBLANK(Form__c), NOT ISBLANK(URL__c) ), AND( ISBLANK(Form__c), ISBLANK(URL__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A UDC Workbook Step must be associated either with a Form or a URL and can not have both.
